CustomField.description: What is driving the prospect to change? How acute is the pain?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: --A score of 0 means we don’t know what the pain is. --A score of 1 means the rep has uncovered some pain, but can’t yet quantify it. --A score of 2 means the rep has identified the pain and quantified it so the customer agrees that ‘staying with OSS or doing nothing’ is no longer an option.
CustomField.label: Identified Pain Score
